Because of their serious health problems, most individuals with Meckel syndrome die before or shortly after birth. Most often, affected infants die of respiratory problems or kidney failure.",GHR,Meckel syndrome
How many people are affected by Meckel syndrome ?,"Meckel syndrome affects 1 in 13,250 to 1 in 140,000 people worldwide. I
